titleStmt.title: A list of all the adventurers in the mine-adventure. May the first, 1700 Note, those marked *** are qualified by their shares to be elected of the select committee. And those marked ** are qualified to vote in a general meeting: and no person has more than one vote.
Lists. 1700-05-01.
titleStmt.author: Corporation of the Mine Adventurers of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by F. Collins in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Includes at end: "A list of the present committee", the lead name of which is the Duke of Leeds.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
